welcome_message_body: Welcome to Little Rock, where southern charm meets modern allure. Get ready to explore our historic landmarks, vibrant arts scene, and delicious cuisine. We hope you enjoy your time in our city!

restaurants.name: Mike's Cafe
restaurants.description: Mike's Cafe is a asian restaurant located in Little Rock.

restaurants.name: Sim's Bar-B-Que
restaurants.description: Sim's Bar-B-Que is a bbq joint located in Little Rock.
restaurants.address: 1307 John Barrow Rd (Kanis), Little Rock, AR 72205

restaurants.description: Panera Bread is a bakery located in Little Rock.

restaurants.name: Cantina Laredo

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Adams Field Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary hub for domestic flights at Adams Field Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the primary hub for international flights at Adams Field Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Little Rock AFB Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Little Rock AFB Airport is dedicated to serving military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
